message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am willing to pay $100 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $110.

I understand you're getting closer to the value you see in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $125. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $115.

I'm still confident that the product's value is higher than that, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and propose a price of $127. It's getting close to the value I have in mind, and I think it's a fair deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in finding a common ground. Based on my understanding of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $120.
